issue.title: [Python] Handle nanosecond timestamps more gracefully when writing to Parquet format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1076](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1076). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For timestamps with that can be converted to micro or milliseconds without data loss, we should adopt a default behavior that does not require the `timestamps_to_ms` argument in `RecordBatch.from_pandas`.
